players.name: Bob
memory: Diana: "This is terrible! Alice is gone already. We need to work together and figure out who did this - the mafioso could be anyone among us three."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "I already revealed Diana is mafia. Bob, vote with me to win."
You: "I believe Charlie. Diana is mafia."

Diana: "Charlie, that's a desperate lie! If you were really the detective, why would you reveal yourself so early? Bob, think about this - Charlie is trying to rush us into a vote without any real evidence!"
